Name: Sink or Skim
About the game: A cute Top-down platformer about a rock and his buddy skipping across a vast ocean together: Two cute rocks On the fly mixing keeps music fresh Unique platforming mechanics Rhythmic button pressing Not very long if you're good, kinda long if you're bad 3 cute rocks if you count Sandford
